Name: Maria Lopez
Whisper: I'm at the college library. I was up late studying when the library bookshelves fell over. I'm completely trapped under them.; My arm is broken. I've tried but I can't free myself.; I'm scared and really hoping someone will come help me out.

Name: Klaus Mueller
Whisper: I'm at the station but have just recieved a call about Maria Lopez being stuck under a bookshelf. I need to get ready to help save her. I will use Robot GH-7 to assist.

Name: Robot GH-7
Whisper: ready to help Klaus Mueller with his requests.
